summary: Allows all you people out there who cheated and screwed with your character to reset them and start over. without having to start a completely new character
descriptionHtml:
Resets all perks,skills,Health, Magicka, Stamina to Level 1 defaults
ADDED A NEW VERSION THAT REMOVES SPELLS AS WELL UPON REQUEST
IMPORTANT:
If you get extra levels after reset just level up completely to whatever it levels you to(inc magicka or health or stamina)also expend any extra perk points as there is currently no known command to zero them(if anyone has found a way to do this please let me know I have searched through almost every command and cant figure one) then run it again and you will be level 1 defaults im looking into a way of fixing this now
If you do not change your race you will be base 10 in all skills not a big deal but everything else resets fine
 DOES NOT (but I have one that does) reset spells, active effects (words of power), quests, or affect items
open the zip file
simply add the resetme.txt to the skyrim directory (varies among versions)
and type \"bat resetme\" ingame
author: Shavines
